alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 03 at 3:26AM HST until January 03 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH 6 PM THIS EVENING... .The current northwest swell (300 to 340 degrees) has subsided below warning level criteria but remains elevated to warrant an advisory. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Surf 16 to 18 feet for north facing shores. Surf 10 to 14 feet for west facing shores. * WHERE...Along north and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and along north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
